lead_paragraph: For a team that was supposed to be the next World Series champion, the Chicago Cubs were embarrassingly bad last year. Instead of following the Red Sox and the White Sox as champions after long droughts, the Cubs created the league’s worst record.
snippet: For a team that was supposed to be the next World Series champion, the Chicago Cubs were embarrassingly bad last year. Instead of following the Red Sox and the White Sox as champions after long droughts, the Cubs created the league’s worst record.
